name: Design, Sew, Wear & Shine - Summer Top
description:
In this two day sewing workshop you make your own original stylish patchwork summer top in delightful cottons including beautiful Japanese fabrics. 
All Materials provided: including an original sewing pattern, fabrics and thread. 
You need to bring a sewing machine and lunch.

2 day Workshop: 10.00am - 2.30pm. 
Castle Cove Studio
Cost $220.00 per person.

name: Creative Textile Workshop  2 day Studio Workshop
description:
Hand Printing, Appliqué & Quilting
In the workshop you will learn a range of stencil printing techniques, free form appliqué and free motion quilting. Using these creative techniques you will make your own beautiful piece of handmade fabric in a relaxed and enjoyable studio workshop. 
The handmade fabric can be made into cushion covers, table runners, place mats, wall hangings or apparel.
All Materials provided.
You need to bring a sewing machine with a free motion foot & lunch.

2 day Workshop: 10.00am - 2.30pm. Castle Cove Studio
Cost 220.00 per person.

name: Drawing with Thread Studio Workshop
description:
Appliqué & free-motion quilting
3 hour Studio Workshop
In the workshop you will explore, create and have fun with free motion quilting in a relaxed and enjoyable studio workshop. 
All Materials provided. 
You need to bring a sewing machine with a quilting foot.


3 hour workshop: 
10.00am - 1.30pm. Castle Cove Studio
Cost $68.00 per person.
